singleItemContent: p>  Do you often remember your dreams?
p>  Are you interested in others’ dreams?
p>  Do you want to make your dreams come true?
p>  Describe a story someone told you and you remember.
p>  What the story was about
p>  Who told you this story?
p>  Why do you remember it?
p>  And explain how you feel about it
p>  Do young children like the same stories as older children?
p>  How has technology changed the way of storytelling?
p>  Why do children like stories?
